pages.text: $(l)(Active-Defensive)/$$(br)Torpedo Decoys are deployed on your own board $(l)on unknown tiles/$. As long as they are not destroyed, they'll act just like $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/torpedo_net)Torpedo Nets/$.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Try to place torpedo decoys where you think the opponent will fire their torpedoes, like in long, unkown lines.$(li)Don't use these if your opponent doesn't have any torpedoes, as they'll provide no value and they'll just be a waste of energy.

$(li)Torpedo decoys must be placed on unknown tiles, meaning that any tile that has already been damaged is not valid. $(l)If you ignore this and still try to place them on a known tile, then nothing happens and the ability is wasted./$$(li)Don't place decoys on occupied tiles, as the ability will be wasted.
